summary: Completed testing Fractal Research Terminal v3 frontend application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend components properly implemented, but UI testing limited by browser automation issues in container environment.

ui_testing_blocked.issue: Playwright browser launch failing in container environment
ui_testing_blocked.details: BrowserType.launch: Target page, context or browser has been closed - DBUS connection errors
ui_testing_blocked.impact: Unable to perform comprehensive UI interaction testing
ui_testing_blocked.workaround: Backend API testing confirms data flow, frontend code analysis confirms component structure

external_preview.issue: Preview shows 'Unavailable - Agent resting after inactivity'
external_preview.workaround: Local testing confirms frontend loads properly

passed_tests: All signal horizons (7d, 14d, 30d) present in API response
Meta fields (symbol, phase, regime) properly structured
Frontend HTML loads successfully on localhost:3000/fractal
All terminal components implemented: MarketHeader, ChartCore, FractalOverlay, ProjectionChart, SignalPanel, FractalIntelligence, HistoricalAccuracy, RiskPanel
ChartModeSwitcher has all 4 modes: Price, Fractal, Projection, Distribution
Components have proper data-testid attributes for testing
Backend URL configuration correct in frontend/.env
success_percentage: Backend: 100%, Frontend Code Analysis: 100%, UI Testing: 0% (blocked by environment)
action_item_for_main_agent: Frontend implementation appears complete and properly structured. All required components are implemented with correct data flow from backend. Consider testing in a different environment if UI interaction testing is critical, or deploy to staging/production for user testing.
